I am a computer science and physics major at Harvey Mudd College interested in backend development and data science.

I have created this website to demonstrate my passion for computer science and to provide a showcase for my resume. As a sophomore at Harvey Mudd College this year, I plan to design my own major in computer science and physics. I have worked with a wide range of tools in many different professional settings. I have interned at Echodyne Coorp and Microsoft Research in Seattle. I have designed a neural network from scratch, helped build a high-altitude wind model, worked on the Linux kernel, and developed numerous websites. Please feel free to reach out to me if you have any questions about my work.

Harvey Mudd College, 340 E. Foothill Boulevard, Claremont CA
